wrapScienceJ.gui

Interface GuiFramework

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiFrameworkIJ

    public interface GuiFramework
    Main interface to manage a Graphical User Interface system

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createWindow(ImageCore image, java.lang.String newWindowTilte)
      Duplicates the image and displays the new image in a new window.
      ImageCore getCurrentImage()
      Allows to retrieve the current image (e.g. in the focused image window) as an ImageCore.
      FileHelper getFileHelper()
      Allows to get access to default directories related to the framework
      GenericDialogBox getGenericDialog()
      Allows to retrieve an instance of a Generic Dialog Box to prompt the user for Generic Process Configuration Parameters.
      MessageBox getMessageBox()
      Allows to retrieve the utility to display message box popups in the GUI
      OpenImageDialog getOpenImageDialog()
      Allows to retrieve the utility to display a Browse for File Dialog in the GUI to open an ImageCore.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessageBox

        MessageBox getMessageBox()
        Allows to retrieve the utility to display message box popups in the GUI
        Returns:
        The utility to display message box popups

      • getOpenImageDialog

        OpenImageDialog getOpenImageDialog()
        Allows to retrieve the utility to display a Browse for File Dialog in the GUI to open an ImageCore.
        Returns:
        The utility to display a Browse for File Dialog in the GUI

      • getGenericDialog

        GenericDialogBox getGenericDialog()
        Allows to retrieve an instance of a Generic Dialog Box to prompt the user for Generic Process Configuration Parameters.
        Returns:
        An instance of a Generic Dialog Box for input of Generic Process Configuration Parameters

      • getCurrentImage

        ImageCore getCurrentImage()
        Allows to retrieve the current image (e.g. in the focused image window) as an ImageCore.
        Returns:
        The current image

      • getFileHelper

        FileHelper getFileHelper()
        Allows to get access to default directories related to the framework
        Returns:
        The file helper to get default directories related to the framework

      • createWindow

        void createWindow(ImageCore image,
                  java.lang.String newWindowTilte)
        Duplicates the image and displays the new image in a new window.
        Parameters:
        image - An image for which a full copy is to be openned in a new window.
        newWindowTilte - Title of the new Window;
